alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Watch issued December 25 at 9:57PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM CST TUESDAY THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding possible. * WHERE...Carlton and South St. Louis County. * WHEN...From 4 AM CST Tuesday through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, and some critical infrastructure may be inundated. Some shoreline erosion may occur.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
